description:
Sex on the Beach

You often wander down to the beach near your vacation home and strip off all your clothes. It's extremely freeing to walk along the beach completely naked. Since your vacation home is so remote, the chances of ever running into anyone are extremely slim. Imagine your surprise when you're walking along the surf and you spot someone walking towards you... and they're naked too! What a sexy meeting ;-)

***

Hi! I'm Britt and I write Trash Kittens, a series of sexy fantasy stories featuring slutty step-sisters, trashy college chicks, and naughty schoolgirls. My text games are overflowing with hot, naughty scenes to get you in the mood. Nothing turns me on like writing kinky smut and fantasizing about hot-bodied, powerful men sweeping me off my feet and having their way with me - SO HOT! ;)
